page.title: 11POPULATION
page.content: The population for this rural area is {quite sparse}when the area involved is taken into account. Most of the population is centred in the villages of Cardinham and Mount with the addition of hamlets such as Warleggan,Bunney's Hill and Fore Downs.The remainder of the population is made up with scattered farms and cottages. The adult population totalling 4O7 is made up as follows: working population totals 272 being l3l females and l4l males. The retirement population total is l35 made up as follows - 74 females and 6l males. The child population totalling l23 is m ade up as follows: under l5 females - 6O and under l8 males - 63, making the{TOTAL POPULATION for the {area 53O.} As this is basically a farming area the population is unaffected by tourism.
